item.title: Nesty Loops
item.description: In this example we will be using KaTeX Create a partial under /layouts/partials/math.html Within this partial reference the Auto-render Extension or host these scripts locally. Include the partial in your templates like so: {{ if or .Params.math .Site.Params.math }} {{ partial "math.html" . }} {{ end }} To enable KaTex globally set the parameter math to true in a project’s configuration To enable KaTex on a per page basis include the parameter math: true in content files Note: Use the online reference of Supported TeX Functions
